id: Document Kit for PM & UI/UX Designer
name: Document Kit for PM & UI/UX Designer
description: Introducing the Document Kit, a full set of Resource Templates that make it easy to build, research, or design a fully digital product. Built for Founder, PM, UI/UX Designer.- 6 main phases- Showcase for each step- 25+ of customizable all the documents- Regularly update the newest document templates- No code requiredWhy did we make this?Most methods build products are hard to use without a template. If you don’t have a template, it’s hard to be practical and hands-on. I have seen many people doi
features: PRO-KIT: You will get access to our Notion workspace - full of documents kit, step-by-step examples, template resources, and further updates.; AIR-KIT: You'll get access to our Dropbox storage - full of template resources organized step by step.
